did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Writings, notes, printed matter, sound recordings of reminiscences, letters, and miscellany, relating to communism in China and India, Sino-Soviet relations, and the study of international relations in the United States. In part, microfilm.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Use copies of some sound recordings, video recordings, or motion picture material in this collection are available for immediate access. Access to other sound recordings, video recordings, or motion picture material requires at least two weeks advance notice. For further information, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Robert Carver North papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1980.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Writings, notes, printed matter, sound recordings of reminiscences, letters, and miscellany, relating to communism in China and India, Sino-Soviet relations, and the study of international relations in the United States. In part, microfilm.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Communism--China.
International relations.
Communism--India.
China--Foreign relations--Soviet Union.
Soviet Union--Foreign relations--China.

did.unittitle: Sound recording of Robert C. North speaking on M N Roy
Sound recording of Robert C. North discussing the history of the Hoover Institution
Sound recording of Robert C. North interview

scopecontent.p: North discusses his life. Cassette I discusses his beginnings at Stanford University and the Hoover Insitution. Cassette II discusses his family history and early life. 3 cassettes

did.unittitle: Sound recording of Robert C. North interview

scopecontent.p: North discusses the work of the Santa Fe Institute and the influence of a philosopher named Roberto
